content.html: Adults: “what if I put a nuclear bomb on a rocket and shot it at supersonic speeds into a volcano?” Kids: “what if I had a really, really big potato? Like 1000 miles wide.” The potato scenario is way more catastrophic!
content.value:
Adults: “what if I put a nuclear bomb on a rocket and shot it at supersonic speeds into a volcano?”

Kids: “what if I had a really, really big potato? Like 1000 miles wide.”

The potato scenario is way more catastrophic!
